title.narrative: WASH and Child Protection in Somalia

description.narrative: The proposed project aims to improve access to quality learning environments in 10 schools in Somalia through the provision of Water, Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH) facilities and the facilitation of child protection activities. The project will target communities that have been affected by the current food insecurity crisis and on-going conflict. Through this intervention, Save the Children aims to provide children with a safe and protective environment where they can continue their learning uninterrupted; have access to quality WASH facilities; gain knowledge and skills about how to protect themselves and their peers; and socialise with each other supporting psychosocial well-being. In order to support this objective, the proposed activities include elements of Child Protection, WASH and Disaster Risk Reduction.
